Dear Chad Sharpe:
Attached is the Renewal Inspection Report for the above referenced agency completed
on 08/21/2025. The renewal inspection has determined substantial compliance with
applicable licensing statutes and rules. Your license is renewed, and you will be receiving
the license in the mail. It is valid only at your present address and is nontransferable. If
you move, please notify us at least 30 days in advance.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the WOC area manager Shay Mavis at 269-243-2725.
Sincerely,
Venus M. Decker,

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The agency is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
Technical Assistance was not requested or offered.

V. CONSULTATION
Consultation was offered in reference to short-term treatment.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
Maltreatment in Care
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
Corrective Action Plan Compliance
The agency has not been required to submit any corrective action plans during
this period under review.
Financial Overview
There are no financial concerns identified based on the review of the facility's
budget and the agency's financial audit.
PREA compliance (if applicable)
N/A
Chief Administrator Assessment
N/A
Staff and Youth Interviews
Staff interviewed spoke highly of the agency and programming. Staff felt supported
and trained well. Staff were excited about their role and the treatment they provide
for youth, even though a short-term facility. No concerns were noted.
Youth interviewed felt safe and supported by staff. Youth were able to verbalize
how they are helped. No concerns were noted.
Description of Agency Walk Through
The agency is well maintained and clean. The facility has decorative paintings and
artwork created by the youth on the walls. The environment is welcoming. There
are no concerns to note.

VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the agency is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes. It is recommended that the agency be issued a renewal of their regular
license.
